 Why you should not use cv2 to read images for ml.
 
 1. 
 img = sample['tgt']
 img = np.transpose(img, (1, 2, 0))
 print(img)
 tensor([[[0.0902, 0.0784, 0.0706],
          [0.0902, 0.0824, 0.0745],
          [0.1137, 0.1373, 0.0627],
          ...,
          [0.5412, 0.6588, 0.3804],
          [0.4667, 0.5804, 0.3686],
          [0.4471, 0.4706, 0.3608]],
         [[0.0863, 0.0863, 0.0784],
          [0.0784, 0.0784, 0.0941],
          [0.0941, 0.0980, 0.0941],
          ...,
          [0.1373, 0.5137, 0.3922],
          [0.2275, 0.5294, 0.3961],
          [0.4157, 0.5255, 0.4039]],
         [[0.1922, 0.1098, 0.0745],
          [0.1725, 0.1451, 0.0902],
          [0.2118, 0.1686, 0.0980],
          ...,
          [0.2510, 0.3882, 0.4039],
          [0.3608, 0.5373, 0.4000],
          [0.4980, 0.7333, 0.4588]],
         ...,
         [[0.5529, 0.5686, 0.5765],
          [0.5490, 0.5647, 0.5647],
          [0.5490, 0.5686, 0.5529],
          ...,
          [0.0667, 0.0941, 0.1294],
          [0.0667, 0.0980, 0.1333],
          [0.0706, 0.0980, 0.1294]],
         [[0.5451, 0.5451, 0.5373],
          [0.5490, 0.5451, 0.5059],
          [0.5529, 0.5412, 0.4824],
          ...,
          [0.0667, 0.0941, 0.1216],
          [0.0667, 0.0980, 0.1176],
          [0.0667, 0.1020, 0.1216]],
         [[0.5529, 0.5373, 0.5255],
          [0.5569, 0.5412, 0.4980],
          [0.5608, 0.5373, 0.4863],
          ...,
          [0.0706, 0.0902, 0.1216],
          [0.0706, 0.0941, 0.1137],
          [0.0667, 0.1020, 0.1137]]])

--------------------------------------------

 2. 
 d = sample['dir']
 img = mpimg.imread(d)
 print(img)
 print(img.shape)
 [[[0.09019608 0.07843138 0.07058824]
   [0.09019608 0.08235294 0.07450981]
   [0.11372549 0.13725491 0.0627451 ]

--------------------------------------------

 3. 
 d = sample['dir']
 img = cv2.imread(d, 0)
 print(img)
 [[ 20  21  31 ... 150 133 115]
  [ 21  20  24 ...  98 108 122]
  [ 33  37  44 ...  88 119 161]
  ...
  [144 142 143 ...  22  23  23]
  [138 138 137 ...  22  23  23]
  [137 137 137 ...  22  22  23]]
